channel.title: Help with pking server
channel.description:
1. I made a new server (but I forget what it was, I think it was slomiscape.no-ip.info, but can't remember.) But when I remembered it, and I tried it, it didnet work (I hadent done anything on it yet.
2. How do I make a server basicly (I have an IP). Who ever helps the most on my PK server will be a spawning Mod.
3. In hybridscape, I added a monster to npc.cfg, but it diden't change anything in Hybridscape. (Yes I saved it, I'm not that stupid)
Thx
(EDIT ON POINT 3.: Now I can't even get into HybridScape, it loses connection even before it loads, help)

item.title: Help with pking server
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

See, thats the problem, I’ve been trying to use testscape, but it ain’t workin, so can anybody suggest a good pking server source?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with pking server
item.dc:creator: @craids craids
item.description:
@craids wrote:

  1. ur probly entering the ip u signed it onto it
    2.send me ur client and stuff ill help
    3.hybridscape is bassed on another cache of rs2 but the sources r based on other1s also which means its more updated(atleast thats wat i think)

4.if i ever go on ur server my name will be jayman7777 if any1 trys to steal my name i will pm slomifier the password of wat ill say to him to make sure its needed so dont bother stealing it

Read full topic
